channel.description: Recent content in learning on Tom Beckett

item.title: Technologies Retrospective 2021
item.description: Here’s my reflection on what technologies I used in 2021 and what I’d like to use in 2022. I also detail my current preferred stack for this year. 2021 The Rules I’ve used a lot of different technologies in 2021. To keep things sensible, I had to use the technology… In production with real customers - that means no ‘I did the tutorial’ opinions allowed. Either for the first time or after a break.
